content: Hi! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. My name's Ava—how can I help you today? Are you needing help with plumbing, electrical, or HVAC services?
Hi, I was just checking if I could get a quote for a minor plumbing job, but honestly I'm overloaded with work this month. I don't think I can schedule anything right now.

No worries at all! We can definitely give you a quote whenever you’re ready. Just let us know when your schedule frees up or if you want to discuss details sooner. Is there anything else I can help you with today?
Thanks, I’ll get back to you next month. Appreciate it!
You’re very welcome! Reach out whenever is convenient. Have a great day!
reason: Customer not available to schedule this month.
